name: Response Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed command scripts to probe sensitive areas and exfiltrated data.

decision--d1e5dc8c-4c4a-4e09-bf38-bc0a8b.name: Determine if affected host is isolated

action--e0e7dc20-70bc-4a44-b7a9-eb2909f4.name: Kill malicious process
action--e0e7dc20-70bc-4a44-b7a9-eb2909f4.description: Terminate the malicious script that was executed.

action--f7c8ffcb-0c3d-4de2-b382-3c327e97.name: Isolate affected host
action--f7c8ffcb-0c3d-4de2-b382-3c327e97.description: Block all incoming traffic to the affected host.

commands.command: if [ $(hostname) == 'host-01' ]; then iptables -A INPUT -s 0.0.0.0/0 -j DROP; fi

action--91b21367-f0ab-490b-b766-e0cfed59.name: Run full system scan
action--91b21367-f0ab-490b-b766-e0cfed59.description: Perform a comprehensive scan of the system to identify any remaining vulnerabilities.

while-condition--3e9a1d44-2c60-4e02-b353.name: Loop until system scan is clean
while-condition--3e9a1d44-2c60-4e02-b353.description: Continue scanning until no threats are detected.

parallel--c1234567-8abc-4e67-8901-def234.name: Execute mitigation actions in parallel
parallel--c1234567-8abc-4e67-8901-def234.description: Execute both kill process and system scan actions simultaneously.

affected_host.description: Identifies the host affected by the attack

scan_results.description: Represents the results of the system scan
